mapper.select: select SQ_BUSKING_ID, id, title, location, latitude, longitude, url, genre, rating, teamname, gallery, gallery2, gallery3, gallery4, gallery5, buskingdate, runningtime, description from sq_buskinglist
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sq_buskinglist VALUES (sq_busking_id_sq.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{location}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, '사용안함', #{genre}, 0, #{teamname}, #{gallery}, null, null, null, null, #{buskingdate}, #{runningtime}, #{description})
